import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../Components/Message' import Loader from '../Components/Loader' import { Login } from '../actions/userActions' import FormContainer from '../Components/FormContainer' export default function LoginScreen( { location }) { const [ email, setEmail ] = useState('') const [ password, setPassword ] = useState('') const redirect = locaion.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() //this is where to submit form dataView } return
